Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.19558186]H1N1(A/PR/8/34):inhibition of virus infection in  Madin-Darby canine kidney(MDCK) cells(IC50=44 μM);H3N2(A/Aichi/2/68):inhibition of virus infection in Madin-Darby canine kidney(MDCK) cells(IC50=17 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide has affinity for glycoconjugates on the cell surface. And its binding to the cell resulted in the significant inhibition of influenza virus infections.

Literature.Title: Inhibition of influenza virus infections by sialylgalactose-binding peptides selected from a phage library.
Literature.Author: Matsubara T, Sumi M, Kubota H, Taki T, Okahata Y, Sato T.
